title: Gigante
content:
This one started out with the capital E and the curves on the top and bottom arms. I went crazy at first and tried to incorporate the curve into every letter, but then went back and toned it down. Seems to work better now.
GIGANTE
gigante.swf (3 k)
!-/attachment-!\>!-attachment:\>
author: eightone

comments.content:
you have some sweet looking typefaces. i like this one, reminds me of masked wresling. mexican style ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031034im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
joshua
